IndexPage.title: Next.js Translator
IndexPage.description: Welcome to the Next.js Internationalization Translator in this er use next (i18n)  package example! This demo showcases the power of the App Router and how to manage multilingual content seamlessly using next Internationalization.

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!
